text_block_list.text: One day, in the afternoon. I was heading to the trainers' offices when I heard a familiar voice.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: ――You over there. ――A notice for you.

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text: Hiii……!? A notice…… p-punishment……!?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: ――There's something ――I need to hand this person. …………Documents. ――from the committee.

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text: Committee――……Ah! It was a requisition form for club activities!? Um…… I-I'll hold on to it……!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: ――Case 1, resolved.
choice_data_list: In the middle of an errand?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: ……Student council work. ――Rudolf is busy. So―― she asked me.
Seems like she noticed how busy the student council president was and offered to help. She was as dutiful as ever.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: I want to become my mentor's results―― is what I thought.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: In this country, Japan―― to become an Uma Musume that could cause a revolution. ――That's my mission.
It was repayment of gratitude to the Symboli family―― I could respect that. ……But, this would probably be tough for her.

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume B
text_block_list.text: Ahahaa, thenー that's when my dadーー whoa!? S-s-s-s-sorry, were we being noisy!?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: No―― documents.

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume C
text_block_list.text: From the committee!? T-that's a relief, I thought you were mad―― ……Ah…… A-anyways! Thank you very much!
And so, the distribution of documents went smoothly, but――

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume D
text_block_list.text: Whoa whoa! ……Huu…… I guess carrying 3 buckets is too much. But I need to hurry――

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: ――Wait. You over there.

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume D
text_block_list.text: Hyaa!? Ah……!
(Slam! ――Splash!)

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: ……The documents didn't get wet.

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume D
text_block_list.text: I-……I-I-I-I'm soooo sorry!!! ……T-towel, a towel! I'll go get a towelーー!!!
choice_data_list: For now, why don't you go change?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: ――――Yeah.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: …………I didn't hand over the documents.
Looks like she was more worried about the documents than herself. Once again―― I couldn't help but see her as a sincere but awkward girl.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: Mission Accomplished――……I appreciate your cooperation.
Certainly, we were able to complete all our tasks safely. However――

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: ――？ …………What do you mean?
choice_data_list: That there were a lot of misunderstandings……

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: ……――But we finished our tasks.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: ――That there was a misunderstanding…… and causing a scene in the hallway―― I'm reflecting on it. ……But――other than that――no problems.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: ――I'll go report.
Even if she was misunderstood, she didn't seem to care. That made me a little worried though――
